articles.description: Arsenal will use the "anger, rage and frustration" from their home loss to Bournemouth against PSG on Wednesday, says boss Mikel Arteta.
articles.title: Arsenal to use 'anger and rage' of Bournemouth loss against PSG

articles.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen beats McLaren's Lando Norris to pole position at the Miami Grand Prix.
articles.title: Miami Grand Prix: Max Verstappen beats Lando Norris to pole

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Real Valladolid vs Barcelona in the Spanish La Liga
articles.title: Real Valladolid vs Barcelona: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Three-time champion Mark Williams produces a vintage display to defeat world number one Judd Trump 17-14, becoming the oldest ever player to reach a World Championship final.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship 2025: Mark Williams defeats Judd Trump 17-14 in semi-final

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from RB Leipzig vs Bayern Munich in the Bundesliga
articles.title: RB Leipzig vs Bayern Munich: Bundesliga stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Fuelled with vengeance for last year's defeat, Northampton Saints produce the knockout blow to end Leinster's pursuit of a fifth star on the jersey.
articles.title: Leinster 34-37 Northampton Saints: Visitors 'punch' Irish province to deliver knockout blow

articles.description: Jamie Vardy is not quite ready to blow the whistle on his legendary Leicester City career, after reaching 199 goals for the club.
articles.title: Jamie Vardy: Leicester striker blows referee's whistle in win against Southampton

articles.description: Aston Villa have moved level on points with the Chelsea in the Premier League's fifth and final Champions League spot, but plenty could change in the final weeks of the campaign.
articles.title: Champions League is Aston Villa's 'dream' - who will prevail in European race?

articles.description: Zhao Xintong began this season banned from snooker but is tipped to be the sport's new "megastar" if he becomes the first Chinese player to win the world title.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship: Zhao Xintong - from match-fixing scandal ban to Crucible final

articles.description: World number one Aryna Sabalenka beats Coco Gauff in a thrilling Madrid Open final.
articles.title: Madrid Open: Aryna Sabalenka beats Coco Gauff in thriller
